title: Fen - Carrion Skies (2014)
description:
Quote:
1. (from UK)
Fen are a musical project inspired by the bleak, esoteric landscapes of Eastern England. They blend aspects of black metal and post-rock to express loss, sorrow, exaltation and a sense of ancient pride through music.

The band was formed in early 2006 by Grungyn, Theutus and The Watcher, and in 2007 Draugluin joined in. In early 2010, Draugluin was replaced by Ãƒâ€ ÃƒÂ°elwalh.
